3:
--------------------
Text: Marquess Jing of Han:  In the first year of his reign, he attacked the State of Zheng and took over Yongqiu in today's Henan, Qi County.
Triplets:<Marquess Jing
4:
ere are the extracted triplets:

<Marquess Jing of Han
5:
--------------------
<Text: Marquess Jing of Han:  In 403 BC, Marquess Jing, along with Marquess Wen of Wei and Marquess Lie of Zhao partitioned the powerful Jin state into Han, Wei, and Zhao marking the beginning of the Warring States Period and Han as an independent polity.>

<Marquess Jing
6:
<Text: Marquess Jing of Han:  King Lie of Zhou was forced to elevate Marquess Jing's title from viscount to marquess.>
Triplets:<Marquess Jing
7:
--------------------
Text: Marquess Jing of Han:  Marquess Jing then moved the capital from Pingyang to Yangzhai.
Triplets:<Marquess Jing
8:
--------------------
Text: Marquess Jing of Han:  In 400 BC, the capital Yangzhai was sieged by the Zheng army.
